Special: Force, Warp Weapon

Note: Two Handed Weapon. If inflicting Zealous Hatred, the target gains one random mutation or reduced to a gibbering, harmless warpspawn if the attack would have killed them. If the wielder fails a Focus Power Test whilst wielding this, they gain 1 Corruption Point.
